title: archive session
close_reason: Implemented on feat/archive-session (0885aee). JSON file store, POST/DELETE API, sidebar toggle, header button.

title: Spike: context % filled indicator
close_reason: Feasible. Usage on all assistant messages. Formula: (input_tokens + cache_creation_input_tokens + cache_read_input_tokens) / 200000 * 100. Models found: claude-opus-4-5-20251101, claude-haiku-4-5-20251001 (both 200K). No blockers.

title: Spike: emit agent wait times in markdown export
close_reason: Feasible. Timestamps exist on every message (ISO 8601). Can compute response latency (user->assistant) and tool execution times (tool_use->tool_result pairs via tool_use_id). No blockers.

title: Drag-to-resize sidebar
description: Add a drag handle to the sidebar edge so users can resize its width by dragging.

title: full text search
close_reason: Implemented on feat/full-text-search (57e3b00). API scans JSONL content, frontend debounces and shows snippets with role labels.

title: view forks of sessoin?
close_reason: Implemented on feat/view-session-forks (4185c97). Tree-based branch detection with numbered switcher at fork points.

title: Multi-select sessions for batch markdown export
close_reason: Implemented on feat/batch-markdown-export (cc895b4). Checkboxes in session list, export button downloads combined markdown file.

title: enable sort by first/last message
close_reason: Implemented on feat/session-timestamps-sort (eb8f5a8). Sort toggle: Latest (last activity) vs Created (first message).

title: Tag conversations (replace folder-name label)
description: Rethink the folder name shown as the label above the title in list view. Introduce user-assignable tags per session; display the top tag in that label position, falling back to folder name when no tags are set. Move the fully qualified file path out of the top of the detail view into a less prominent location (e.g. info panel or tooltip).

title: Pin conversation to top
description: Allow users to pin sessions to the top of the sidebar list so they stay visible regardless of sort order.

title: History cache never expires when file watcher misses events
close_reason: Fixed: historyCache had no TTL â€” once loaded at server start it stayed forever unless chokidar fired invalidateHistoryCache(). In Linux/container environments inotify events are unreliable, so cache became permanently stale. Fix: added 5s TTL to history cache (storage.ts) and 5s SSE polling fallback for both sessions and conversation streams (server.ts), so UI updates regardless of watcher reliability.

title: Spike: model name availability in JSONL
close_reason: Model name confirmed at message.model in JSONL. Type defined at api/storage.ts:30. Unblocks context indicator work.

title: copy markdown of convo button
close_reason: Implemented Copy Markdown button with conversation-to-markdown utility

title: Show first/last message timestamps in list view
close_reason: Implemented on feat/session-timestamps-sort (eb8f5a8). Shows created timestamp below each session entry.

title: Add timestamps to each message
close_reason: Implemented on feat/message-timestamps (ae096b7). ISO timestamps formatted and displayed below each message.
